channel.title: Help VPS
channel.description:
My friend recently bought a VPS and putted his server in it The only problem is that the server works fine at his computer but when i run it on VPS it opens quickly and closes quickly?
Anyone help please?

item.title: Help VPS
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: /;//jython/jar;//MySq
l/mysql-connector-java-3/0/17-ga-bin/jar
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .;…jython.jar;…MySql.mysql-connec
tor-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320)
Could not find the main class: server
7-ga-bin.jar. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Thats it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2009, 12:31:45 pm[/size][hr]But im not missing server.cfg or server.class[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2009, 12:40:33 pm[/size][hr]Please help -.-?

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah. well its the main class is server no capitals. this is what my runner is
@Echo off
Title Rune-Remedy
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” server
pause

That actually says server IS the main class so idk whats wrong

item.title: Help VPS
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Snaz, post:27, topic:308952”]download a new server source? looks like one of your files is missing or something

or you have messed it up while coding (may have pressed space instead of tab)[/quote]If you actually read his error, you’d know it isn’t a space instead of tab.
He has either deleted some important file, or doesn’t know what the main class file is, which is mainly server without capitals at all

item.title: Help VPS
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:24, topic:308952”]Use a basic run.bat something like

@Echo off Title Rune-Remedy "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk#\bin\java.exe" server pause

And of course jdk# is your JDK or JRE version you have in C:\Program Files\Java such as jdk1.6.0_02 or jre6[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help VPS
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Use a basic run.bat something like

@Echo off Title Rune-Remedy "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk#\bin\java.exe" server pause

And of course jdk# is your JDK or JRE version you have in C:\Program Files\Java such as jdk1.6.0_02 or jre6

Read full topic
